description: The UDF standard is developed and maintained by the Optical Storage Technology Association (OSTA).

NOTE: Even though the UDF format is commonly used, the ".udf" extension is not. Instead, disc burning applications typically save images in their own formats and then burn them using the UDF standard.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .udf file in UYAP Doküman Editörü 5
images.caption: UDF file open in UYAP Doküman Editörü 5
